availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edmund A. Starling (Hopkinsville, Christian County, Kentucky, resident and Colonel (U.S.A.))

body.p: Hopkinsville, Christian County, Kentucky, soldier (U.S.A.). Kentucky native. Served in the 35th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as colonel from October 2, 1863 to December 29, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Find A Grave, "Edmund Alexander Starling (November 22, 1826- June 14, 1880)," Memorial #89740062, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/89740062 (accessed July 23, 2019).
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 352.
KYR-0003-072-0001.
